str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Mustard (probably the shrub, not the herb). Perhaps from sinomai; mustard.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
This; he, she, it.
A sycamore tree, black mulberry tree. Of Hebrew origin in imitation of sukomoraia; a sycamore-fig tree.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To root out, pluck up by the roots. From ek and rhizoo; to uproot.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To plant, set. From a derivative of phuo; to set out in the earth, i.e. Implant; figuratively, to instil doctrine.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably prolonged from hals; the sea.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From hupo and akouo; to hear under, i.e. To listen attentively; by implication, to heed or conform to a command or authority.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
